BeInCrypto คว้ารางวัล ‘Best Website for Economics and Finance’ ในงาน Brasil Publisher Awards 2025

BeInCrypto Wins ‘Best Website for Economics and Finance’ at Brasil Publisher Awards 2025

1h ago//Iva Belamaric
ethereum
AI

Summary

TH

BeInCrypto Brasil ได้รับเกียรติให้เป็นผู้ชนะรางวัล 'เว็บไซต์ยอดเยี่ยมด้านเศรษฐกิจและการเงิน' ในงาน Brazil Publisher Awards 2025 (BPA) ซึ่งจัดโดยสมาคมสำนักพิมพ์แห่งชาติบราซิล การได้รับรางวัลนี้สะท้อนให้เห็นถึงความมุ่งมั่นของแพลตฟอร์มในการนำเสนอข่าวสารคุณภาพสูงเกี่ยวกับดิจิทัลเศรษฐกิจและ Blockchain โดยสามารถเอาชนะคู่แข่งที่มีชื่อเสียงอย่าง Banco Safra และ Remessa Online ได้สำเร็จ Luís De Magalhães หัวหน้าห้องข่าวละตินอเมริกาของ BeInCrypto ระบุว่าความสำเร็จนี้เกิดจากการที่ทีมงานให้ความสำคัญกับความต้องการทางเศรษฐกิจที่แท้จริงของภูมิภาค เช่น การป้องกันเงินเฟ้อและการโอนเงิน มากกว่าการแปลข่าวจากต่างประเทศ เพื่อตอบโจทย์ผู้อ่านโดยตรง ตั้งแต่ปี 2018 BeInCrypto ได้ขยายผู้อ่านไปถึงกว่า 7 ล้านคนต่อเดือนใน 26 ภาษา และยังคงเป็นสมาชิกของ Trust Project ที่มุ่งมั่นส่งมอบข้อมูลข่าวสารทางการเงินที่ถูกต้องและน่าเชื่อถือ

EN

BeInCrypto Brasil has been honored with the ‘Best Website: Economics & Finance’ award at the 2025 Brazil Publisher Awards (BPA), organized by the National Association of Publishers of Brazil. The recognition highlights the platform's commitment to high-quality journalism regarding the digital economy and Blockchain, distinguishing it from notable finalists such as Banco Safra and Remessa Online. Luís De Magalhães, leader of BeInCrypto’s Latin America newsroom, attributed the success to the team's focus on the region's specific economic realities, such as inflation protection and remittances, rather than merely translating global narratives. Since 2018, BeInCrypto has expanded to reach over 7 million monthly readers across 26 languages and remains a member of the Trust Project, dedicated to delivering accurate and reliable financial news.

Key Points

  • BeInCrypto Brasil wins ‘Best Website: Economics & Finance’ at the 2025 Brazil Publisher Awards.
  • The award recognizes the platform's dedication to covering the digital economy, Blockchain, and financial innovation in Latin America.
  • Luís De Magalhães credits the win to journalism that addresses local economic needs like inflation and remittances.
  • BeInCrypto reaches over 7 million monthly readers globally and is a member of the Trust Project.

Article

BeInCrypto has been recognized as a leader in digital financial journalism, winning ‘Best Website: Economics & Finance’ at the 2025 Brazil Publisher Awards (BPA). Organized by the National Association of Publishers of Brazil (ANPB), this year’s edition embraced the theme ‘Authentic Intelligence’, bringing together media leaders from across the country to honor projects that combine editorial integrity, technological creativity, and societal contributions. BeInCrypto Brasil stood out among a competitive group of finalists, including Banco Safra, Piauí Negócios, Remessa Online, and Mercado & Consumo, earning the top honor for its dedication to delivering high-quality journalism focused on the digital economy, blockchain, and financial innovation. Sponsored Sponsored Special kudos go to Luís De Magalhães, leader of BeInCrypto’s Latin America newsroom, whose vision and leadership were central to the team’s success. Luís commented: “Latin America has become one of the most dynamic regions for crypto adoption, driven by real economic needs: inflation protection, remittances, financial inclusion. Our newsroom was built on the premise that this story deserved dedicated, professional coverage in Portuguese and Spanish. This award affirms that readers value journalism that speaks to their reality, not just translates global narratives. I’m proud of what our team has accomplished, and we’re just getting started.” The BPA 2025 was co-organized by PremiumAds and sponsored by companies including Membrana Media, Taboola, AdOpt, Seox, Viads, MGID, and Teads, leaders in digital media, content, and technology. Finalists were selected by a panel of judges with expertise in communication, technology, and business, and the process was independently audited by GMKT Market Intelligence Solutions. Since 2018, BeInCrypto has grown into a leading crypto news platform, reaching over 7 million monthly readers in 26 languages. As a proud member of the Trust Project, we deliver accurate, reliable, and timely coverage of the digital economy, blockchain, and financial innovation, providing readers with trusted insights and analysis that inform and empower decision-making across Latin America and beyond. For more information, access: https://bpa.anpb.com.br/ Disclaimer All the information contained on our website is published in good faith and for general information purposes only. Any action the reader takes upon the information found on our website is strictly at their own risk.
